<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.geometry.Insets?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Button?> <?import javafx.scene.image.Image?> <?import javafx.scene.image.ImageView?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.HBox?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.StackPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.VBox?> <?import javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Font?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Text?>
<AnchorPane prefHeight="495.0" prefWidth="760.0" style="-fx-background-radius: 50;" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/24.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1"> <children> <StackPane prefHeight="495.0" prefWidth="760.0" style="-fx-background-radius: 50;"> <children> <javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle arcHeight="5.0" arcWidth="5.0" fill="#2b5237" height="495.0" stroke="BLACK" strokeType="INSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" style="-fx-arc-height: 0; -fx-arc-width: 0;" width="760.0" /> <javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle arcHeight="5.0" arcWidth="5.0" fill="WHITE" height="419.0" stroke="BLACK" strokeType="INSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" style="-fx-arc-width: 70; -fx-arc-height: 70;" width="678.0" /> </children> </StackPane> <VBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" layoutX="40.0" layoutY="37.0" prefHeight="338.0" prefWidth="678.0"> <children> <Text fill="#2b5237" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Are you ready, {Name}?"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="25.0" /> </font> <VBox.margin> <Insets top="40.0" /> </VBox.margin> </Text> <Text fill="#2b5237" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="You have selected {mode} in {difficulty} level."> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="22.0" /> </font> </Text> <ImageView fitHeight="202.0" fitWidth="315.0" pickOnBounds="true" preserveRatio="true"> <image> <Image url="@../../../assets/hands-typing.png" /> </image> </ImageView> <Text fill="#2b5237" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Crush the words, own the rhythm, and let your"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="16.0" /> </font> </Text> <Text fill="#2b5237" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="skills do the talking."> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="16.0" /> </font> </Text> </children> </VBox> <HBox alignment="CENTER" layoutX="41.0" layoutY="373.0" prefHeight="85.0" prefWidth="678.0" spacing="32.0"> <children> <Button mnemonicParsing="false" prefHeight="31.0" prefWidth="173.0" style="-fx-background-color: #2B5237; -fx-background-radius: 100;" text="MAIN MENU" textFill="#f6b539"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="16.0" /> </font> </Button> <Button mnemonicParsing="false" prefHeight="42.0" prefWidth="42.0" style="-fx-background-color: #2B5237; -fx-background-radius: 100;"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="20.0" fitWidth="20.0" pickOnBounds="true" preserveRatio="true"> <image> <Image url="@../../../assets/leaderboard.png" /> </image> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> <Button mnemonicParsing="false" prefHeight="42.0" prefWidth="42.0" style="-fx-background-color: #2B5237; -fx-background-radius: 100;"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="20.0" fitWidth="20.0" pickOnBounds="true" preserveRatio="true"> <image> <Image url="@../../../assets/settings.png" /> </image> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> <Button mnemonicParsing="false" prefHeight="42.0" prefWidth="42.0" style="-fx-background-color: #2B5237; -fx-background-radius: 100;"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="20.0" fitWidth="20.0" pickOnBounds="true" preserveRatio="true"> <image> <Image url="@../../../assets/question-mark.png" /> </image> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> <Button mnemonicParsing="false" prefHeight="31.0" prefWidth="173.0" style="-fx-background-color: #2B5237; -fx-background-radius: 100;" text="LET'S TYPE" textFill="#f6b539"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="16.0" /> </font> </Button> </children> </HBox> </children> </AnchorPane>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.geometry.Insets?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Button?> <?import javafx.scene.image.Image?> <?import javafx.scene.image.ImageView?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.HBox?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.StackPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.VBox?> <?import javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Font?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Text?>
<AnchorPane prefHeight="495.0" prefWidth="760.0" style="-fx-background-radius: 50;" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/24.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.example.typejam.ReadySceneController"> <children> <StackPane prefHeight="495.0" prefWidth="760.0" style="-fx-background-radius: 50;"> <children> <javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle arcHeight="5.0" arcWidth="5.0" fill="#2b5237" height="495.0" stroke="BLACK" strokeType="INSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" style="-fx-arc-height: 0; -fx-arc-width: 0;" width="760.0" /> <javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle arcHeight="5.0" arcWidth="5.0" fill="WHITE" height="419.0" stroke="BLACK" strokeType="INSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" style="-fx-arc-width: 70; -fx-arc-height: 70;" width="678.0" /> </children> </StackPane> <VBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" layoutX="40.0" layoutY="37.0" prefHeight="338.0" prefWidth="678.0"> <children> <Text fill="#2b5237" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Are you ready, {Name}?"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="25.0" /> </font> <VBox.margin> <Insets top="40.0" /> </VBox.margin> </Text> <Text fill="#2b5237" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="You have selected {mode} in {difficulty} level."> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="22.0" /> </font> </Text> <ImageView fitHeight="202.0" fitWidth="315.0" pickOnBounds="true" preserveRatio="true"> <image> <Image url="@../../../assets/hands-typing.png" /> </image> </ImageView> <Text fill="#2b5237" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="Crush the words, own the rhythm, and let your"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="16.0" /> </font> </Text> <Text fill="#2b5237" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="skills do the talking."> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="16.0" /> </font> </Text> </children> </VBox> <HBox alignment="CENTER" layoutX="41.0" layoutY="373.0" prefHeight="85.0" prefWidth="678.0" spacing="32.0"> <children> <Button fx:id="mainMenuButton" onAction="#onMainMenu" mnemonicParsing="false" prefHeight="31.0" prefWidth="173.0" style="-fx-background-color: #2B5237; -fx-background-radius: 100;" text="MAIN MENU" textFill="#f6b539"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="16.0" /> </font> </Button> <Button fx:id="leaderboardButton" onAction="#onLeaderboard" mnemonicParsing="false" prefHeight="42.0" prefWidth="42.0" style="-fx-background-color: #2B5237; -fx-background-radius: 100;"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="20.0" fitWidth="20.0" pickOnBounds="true" preserveRatio="true"> <image> <Image url="@../../../assets/leaderboard.png" /> </image> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> <Button fx:id="settingsButton" onAction="#onSettings" mnemonicParsing="false" prefHeight="42.0" prefWidth="42.0" style="-fx-background-color: #2B5237; -fx-background-radius: 100;"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="20.0" fitWidth="20.0" pickOnBounds="true" preserveRatio="true"> <image> <Image url="@../../../assets/settings.png" /> </image> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> <Button fx:id="aboutButton" onAction="#onAbout" mnemonicParsing="false" prefHeight="42.0" prefWidth="42.0" style="-fx-background-color: #2B5237; -fx-background-radius: 100;"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="20.0" fitWidth="20.0" pickOnBounds="true" preserveRatio="true"> <image> <Image url="@../../../assets/question-mark.png" /> </image> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> <Button fx:id="letsTypeButton" onAction="#onLetsType" mnemonicParsing="false" prefHeight="31.0" prefWidth="173.0" style="-fx-background-color: #2B5237; -fx-background-radius: 100;" text="LET'S TYPE" textFill="#f6b539"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="16.0" /> </font> </Button> </children> </HBox> </children> </AnchorPane>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Text?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Font?>
<AnchorPane prefHeight="495.0" prefWidth="760.0" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/24.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1"> <children> <Text layoutX="200" layoutY="240" text="Typing Game - Coming Soon" fill="#2b5237"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="24.0" /> </font> </Text> </children> </AnchorPane>
